feed.title: Track Awesome Laravel Updates Daily
feed.subtitle: A curated list of bookmarks, packages, tutorials, videos and other cool resources from the Laravel ecosystem

entry.title: Awesome Laravel Updates on May 08, 2020
entry.content:
Popular Packages / Utilities

  • Laravel Mailbox (⭐1.1k) - A package to handle incoming emails
  • stancl/tenancy (⭐4k) - Automatic tenancy for your Laravel app. No code changes needed.

Development Setup / Third-party Service Integration

entry.title: Awesome Laravel Updates on Mar 30, 2018
entry.content:
Essentials

  • Lumen (Documentation)
  • Laravel News (Archive)

Popular Packages / Testing & Debugging

  • Laravel TestTools - Chrome extension to generate Laravel integration tests while using your app
  • Laravel Test Factory Generator (⭐937) - Generate Laravel test factories from your existing models

Popular Packages / Utilities

  • Laravel Video Chat (⭐811) - Video Chat using Socket.IO and WebRTC
  • Widgets for Laravel (⭐1.1k) - A powerful alternative to view composers.

Popular Packages / Media & Document Management

  • Intervention Image (⭐14k) - Image handling library for creating, editing and composing images
  • Laravel Glide (⭐438) - Easily convert images with Glide
  • Laravel MediaLibrary (⭐6k) - Associate files with Eloquent models
  • Laravel Snappy (⭐2.7k) - HTML to PDF generator using wkhtmltopdf
  • Laravel DOMPDF (⭐7k) - HTML to PDF generator using dompdf (⭐11k)
  • Laravel Stapler (⭐556) - ORM-based file upload manager
  • Laravel Excel (⭐13k) - Import and export Excel and CSV files

Popular Packages / Monitoring

  • Horizon (⭐4k) - Monitor and configure queues with a simple web UI
  • Laravel Failed Job Monitor (⭐973) - Get notified when a queued job fails
  • Laravel Uptime Monitor (⭐1k) - A powerful and easy to configure uptime and ssl monitor

Application Hosting / Third-party Service Integration

  • Heroku (Documentation)

Starter Projects / Videos

  • Spark

entry.title: Awesome Laravel Updates on Mar 25, 2018
entry.content:
Essentials

  • Laravel (Documentation)

Popular Packages / Developer Tools

  • Laravel API/Scaffold/CRUD Generator (⭐3.8k) - Generator for APIs, CRUD scaffolds etc.
  • Laravel Tinx (⭐448) - Reload your Laravel Tinker session from inside Tinker
  • Laravel API Documentation Generator (⭐3.5k) - Automatically generate your API documentation

Popular Packages / Testing & Debugging

  • LogViewer (⭐2.4k) - Provides a log viewer
  • LERN (⭐439) - Record exceptions into a database and will send you a notification
  • Laravel Tail (⭐743) - The missing tail command

Popular Packages / Authentication & Authorization

  • Doorman (⭐1k) - Limit access to your Laravel applications by using invite codes

Popular Packages / Utilities

  • Artisan View (⭐869) - Manage the views in Laravel projects via artisan
  • Captcha (⭐2.5k) - An anti-bot image captcha system
  • Multi-tenant (⭐2.6k) - Flexible multi tenancy with secure separation of routes, assets and databases
  • Laravel Form Builder (⭐1.7k) - Form builder inspired by Symfony's form builder
  • Laravel Datatables (⭐4.8k) - jQuery DataTables API
  • Laravel GeoIP (⭐2.2k) - Determine the location of website visitors based on their IP addresses
  • Laravel Moderation (⭐528) - Approve or reject resources like posts, comments, users, etc.
  • Laravel Tags (⭐1.7k) - Add tags and taggable behaviour
  • Purifier (⭐1.9k) - HTML filter
  • Friendship (⭐704) - Friendship management system
  • Laravel UUID (⭐1.8k) - Generate a UUID according to the RFC 4122 standard
  • Laravel Installer (⭐1.9k) - Allow users to install your application just by following the setup wizard, like WordPress
  • Laravel Modules (⭐5.8k) - Easy module management
  • Laravel Phone (⭐2.9k) - Phone number validator and formatter
  • Laravel Ban (⭐1.1k) - Simplify blocking and banning Eloquent models
  • Laravel Proxy (⭐7.3k) - Handling sessions when behind load balancers or other intermediaries.

Popular Packages / Integration with Javascript

  • Javascript Validation (⭐1.1k) - Use validation rules, messages, FormRequest and validators to validate forms in client-side
  • Laravel Pjax (⭐509) - A Pjax middleware
  • Laravel Blade Javascript (⭐621) - A Blade directive to export variables to JavaScript
  • Ziggy (⭐4.2k) - Use your Laravel named routes in JavaScript

Popular Packages / Databases, ORMs, Migrations & Seeding

  • Laravel OCI8 (⭐855) - Oracle DB driver via OCI8
  • Laravel Repository (⭐4.2k) - Repositories to abstract the database layer

Popular Packages / APIs

  • Laravel Fractal (⭐1.9k) - Output complex, flexible, AJAX/RESTful data structures with Fractal
  • Laravel Responder (⭐884) - Build custom API responses with Fractal

Popular Packages / Tasks, Commands and Scheduling

  • Elixir (⭐1.1k) - Node (NPM) package to run Gulp tasks
  • Mix (⭐5.3k) - Fluent API for defining basic webpack build steps

Popular Packages / Optimization

  • Rememberable (⭐1.1k) - Query caching for Eloquent
  • Widgetize (⭐908) - Page Partial caching
  • Laravel Responsecache (⭐2.6k) - Speed up app by caching the entire response

Popular Packages / Localization

  • Laravel Translatable (⭐2.3k) - Making Eloquent models translatable by storing translations as JSON
  • Laravel Translation (⭐360) - Translation and localization management

Popular Packages / Third-party Service Integration

  • Laravel Analytics (⭐3.2k) - Retrieve pageviews and other data from Google Analytics

Development Setup / Third-party Service Integration

  • Homestead - Official Vagrant box for Laravel
  • Valet - Development environment for Mac users
  • Stacker (⭐364) - The environment for local web development on Docker
  • Devilbox (⭐4.5k) - A dockerized and general-purpose LAMP/MEAN stack for every PHP version

Application Hosting / Third-party Service Integration

  • FortRabbit
  • AWS Elastic Beanstalk (Tutorial)

Code Snippets / Third-party Service Integration

  • Laravel LTS Cheat Sheet (Chinese version)
  • Laravel Tricks

Tutorials & Blogs / Third-party Service Integration

  • Tuts+
  • Matt Stauffer
  • Vegi Bit
  • Dor.ky
  • Stillat

Videos / Third-party Service Integration

  • Servers for Hackers
  • Test-Driven Laravel
  • Duilio Palacios (ES)
  • CodigoFacilito (ES)
  • Udemy
  • Lynda
  • Pluralsight

Conferences / Third-party Service Integration

  • Laraconf Brasil
  • Laracon Australia

Books / Videos

  • Laravel 5.4 For Beginners by Bill Keck
  • Laravel Up & Running by Matt Stauffer
  • Laravel Companion by Johnathon Koster
  • Deploy Laravel on AWS with CloudFormation by Lionel Martin
  • React Native and Laravel for Future Mobile Development by Ega Radiegtya
  • Servers for Hackers by Chris Fidao
  • Full-Stack Vue.js 2 and Laravel 5 by Anthony Gore

Starter Projects / Videos

  • LaraAdmin (⭐1.6k)
  • Grafite Builder (⭐985)
  • Laravel Boilerplate (⭐5.6k)
  • Laravel Angular Material Starter (⭐1.7k)
  • AdminLTE Laravel (⭐1.8k)
  • Laravel API Starter Kit (⭐426)
  • Backpack for Laravel (⭐937)
  • SomelineStarter (⭐838)
  • Laravel Admin (⭐11k)
  • Voyager (⭐12k)
  • REST API With Lumen (⭐485)
  • Apiato (⭐3.1k)

Codebases for Reference / Videos

  • GitScrum (⭐2.9k) - Task management with Git and Scrum
  • Laravel.io (⭐2.5k) - Source for the Laravel.io Community Portal
  • Jigsaw (⭐2.2k) - Static site generator
  • Monica (⭐23k) - Personal relationship management system

Content Management Systems / Videos

  • OctoberCMS (⭐11k)
  • PyroCMS (⭐3.2k)
  • Lavalite (⭐2.9k)
  • Asgard CMS (⭐785)
  • Microweber (⭐3.3k)
  • Coaster CMS (⭐389)
  • Laralum (⭐296)

entry.title: Awesome Laravel Updates on Aug 23, 2016
entry.content:

Popular Packages / Authentication & Authorization

  • JWT Auth (⭐11k) - JSON Web Token authentication for APIs

  • Socialite (⭐5.7k) - OAuth authentication with Facebook, Google, Twitter etc.

Popular Packages / Utilities

  • Bootstrapper (⭐557) - Set of classes to create Bootstrap 3 markup
  • Eloquent Sluggable (⭐4k) - Create slugs for Eloquent models
  • Laravel Markdown (⭐1.3k) - CommonMark markdown parser
  • Laravel Messenger (⭐2.5k) - User messaging system
  • Laravel Stats Tracker (⭐2.9k) - Gather information from requests to identify and store
  • noCAPTCHA (⭐365) - Helper for Google's new noCAPTCHA (reCAPTCHA)

  • Teamwork (⭐1.1k) - User to team associations with an invite system
  • Validating (⭐970) - Trait for validating Eloquent models

  • ClosureTable (⭐463) - Closure table pattern implementation

  • Migrations Generator (⭐3.3k) - Generate migrations from an existing database

Popular Packages / Search

  • Elasticquent (⭐1.4k) - Elasticsearch for Eloquent models
  • Searchable (⭐2k) - Trait that adds a simple search function to Eloquent models

Popular Packages / APIs

  • Dingo API (⭐9.3k) - Multi-purpose toolkit for developing RESTful APIs
